text:
Us Weekly also learned that the reality star WILL be making a special appearance on the Teen Mom OG reunion -- and fortunately, producers are very much prepared to work with her.

"Catelynn's doctors have been in contact with producers of the reunion to discuss how to handle the questioning and intensity of the subject matter," a source revealed. "MTV has always been extremely supportive of Catelynn and her treatment. Naturally, this will continue during filming of the reunion. If at any time it becomes too intense for Catelynn, she knows to just ask for a break in filming."



More from CafeMom: 18 Times Catelynn & Tyler Baltierra Totally Stole Our Hearts
